header_text: You just received an award for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren’t congratulating you because they don’t think you deserve it.

elements.Text: Do you feel worried about what other people think?

elements.name: You just received an award for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren’t congratulating you because they don’t think you deserve it._Social Situations_comp_question
